dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9282 IH: Veterans Protection from Fraud Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett (for himself, Mr. Carson, Mr. Cohen, Mr. Buck, Mr. Steube, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Bilirakis, Ms. Malliotakis, Mr. Garbarino, Ms. Salazar, Mr. Gaetz, Mr. Budd, Mr. Moulton, Mr. Johnson of Louisiana, Mr. Fallon, Ms. Underwood, Ms. Conway, Mr. C. Scott Franklin of Florida, Mr. Chabot, and Mr. Reschenthaler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to enhance penalties for certain crimes committed against veterans, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Protection from Fraud Act.

section.header: Enhanced penalties for certain crimes against veterans
section.text: Section 2326(2) of title 18, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking or at the end;
in subparagraph (B), by striking the comma and inserting ; or; and
by inserting after subparagraph (B) the following:

subparagraph.text: targeted veterans (as such term is defined in section 101 of title 38) of any age,
